mapper.select: select total_money from kids where kid_id = #{kidId}
mapper.update: update kids set total_money = total_money + #{amount} where kid_id = #{kidId}
update kids set total_money = total_money - #{amount} where kid_id = #{kidId}
mapper.select: select contents, amount, date, is_deposit, left_money, kid_id from budget where kid_id = #{kidId}
select sum(case when is_deposit then amount else -amount end) from budget where kid_id=#{kidId} and date(date) = curdate()

select sum(case when is_deposit then amount else -amount end) from budget where kid_id=#{kidId} and date_format(date, "%Y-%m-%d") between adddate(curdate(),-weekday(curdate())+0) and adddate(curdate(),-weekday(curdate())+6)
select contents, sum(amount) as amount from budget where kid_id=#{kidId} group by contents;
